name: Steve Austin
text: I really wish there was a better pizza place around. This place isn't a choice, it's a lack of options. If they could get my order right just ONCE I would be impressed. Haven't been there in several months due to the last order being …More

name: Alyssa LaRaia
text: Waited an hour and 20 minutes for our delivery. Our pizza came and it was paper thin - literally - Paper thin. We didn't even eat it. $45 bucks down the drain. Wont be going back. Ever.

name: Nicole Piedot
text: Been a long time since I visited a pizza hut.  Pizza was good, bread sticks ok, salad bar wouldn't touch.  With that being said the place was empty so maybe it was leftover from lunch.  Went on a Tuesday around 7 pm.  Server was very nice and attentive.  Would give them another try.

name: Aleksei
text: Disappointed with the way the pizza turned out. The pizza was very thin, much thinner than what the pictures on the website look. Felt like I was just eating cheese and nothing else. Even Little Caesars would have been a better option, and their pizzas taste like cardboard.

name: uncle Brent
text: Gross food bad service. Close that dump.  Do not go there

name: Jason Pollard
text: Slowest place ever. We were the only ones in the place and it took over an hour to get a few personal size pizzas. I realize carry out orders occur but there should probably be more than 1 person making pizzas in the back !

name: Karen Gauthier
text: The pizza isn't what it use to be.  No pizza or salad bar. Only one person working. It's hard to do all the jobs when you are the only one working.  The pizza wasn't ready when promised.  It's  not hard to see why.  Probably will not return.

name: Kenshin Himura
text: Went there for dine in. Ordered bread sticks and 2 pizzas. An hour later and only one pizza comes out and the bread sticks. This is on a Sunday when I am the only customer in the building. They completely forgot to make the second pizza. .. …More

name: Sunny Sky
text: ZERO stars-this place stinks-it's dirty, chairs are filthy, salt, pepper shakers greasy, windows dirty, noticed all this while waiting 70 minutes for one bland gummy under cooked pizza. Salad bar, overpriced,  sad, tomatoes were old, mushy …More

name: WM Luna
text: Pizza / salad bar lunch buffet has moderately finite options, but good/tasty enough and filling. Looks clean. Replenished in a timely-ish manner. Pretty much about what you'd expect in the all-you-can-eat aspect.

name: Lynn Bassler
text: Horrible. We went in at 6:00 on a Monday night. The waitress looked amazed that there were actually people there to eat. After she got over her shock she told us to sit anywhere and promptly walked away. Those were the only words she spoke …More

name: Shantel Noble
text: Best pizza in the area IMO. The dough is the best part. The sauce to cheese to toppings ratio is on point. Great prices for the quality and quantity compared to other pizza joints. Our go-to pizza spot.

name: Vickie Carr
text: Had a birthday party there for my grandson. The staff were excellent at attending to our needs.

name: William-Cody Layne
text: Staff is very friendly, especially when dining in. The restaurant itself has the atmosphere of your favorite uncle's or brother's house, where the decor is slightly cheesy, but you still love it and it gives you a sense of comfort. The food is pizza, pretty hard to mess that up.

name: Wayne Conley
text: This was the third time I have been to this specific pizza hut. The first two times were ok (this was due to one very hard working waitress) the food is good for what you expect at pizza hut. However, the last time I was there my family and …More

name: greg briggs
text: As a pizza hut this is average. Place is a little dark and run down. Staff act in a ho hum fashion. even though they are not out of the way the restaurant does not stand out when looking for it. Food is ok, never looks like the commercials.

name: H H
text:
Update: they closed!! Super bummed

Use to be great. The last two times I've been in there the pizza hasn't been up …More

name: Likenya Thomas
text: Rude. Every time I walk in here the person at the register never greets me. And I'm always forced to wait for the food that I pre ordered before I got there. I don't understand if there's no one in the restaurant, what the hell is taking so …More

name: tim gustafson
text: Fantastic food and staff! They always strive to give the best customer service possible!

name: Rhonda Gelstein
text: We were the only people in the dining room at noon. Several of the tables were dirty and the floor was not very clean. No lunch buffet or specials.  The waitress was friendly and our food was good.

name: Nicole Sprague
text: We came in to sit down to eat in at the wrong time! They had 1 waitress, who was new, and the staff was running around chaos. They were messing up orders, ect. Every customer that came in because they called ahead or ordered online were …More

name: Leanne
text: They let us place our order online and it said it will be ready in 10 mins. We go to the location and they have a sign on the door saying closing at 6. What pizza place closes at 6 on a Saturday? There were no pizza hut signs anywhere. …More

name: Nick Oden
text: The owner should be ashamed of themself and the employees they choose to run this place. What a shame 1st 2nd and 3rd time here every time it was a disappointment and regreted my decision the first time but gave them the benefit of the …More

name: Steven Smith
text: Placed a online order,  they tried to call me to tell me they didn't have the product i ordered and there phone reception was terrible.  Could only understand every other word.

name: Mr. Polo Redd
text: Love Pizza Hut! Hard to find a dine-in one now a days.  Glad we found this one after leaving the water park.

name: manic4 Organic
text: Pizza hut has very good pizza. The service is very quick and fast. The pizza is worth the money.

name: tom downey
text: Good service. Pretty waitress's, and they finally cut the bad staff. Good job guys!

name: G. S
text: Great prices great food great service.

name: Katy Van
text: Did an online order for delivery of pizza and bread sticks, only got half of the bread sticks ordered. When  I called the restaurant,  the girl tried to put me on hold and ended up hanging up on me, I called back and tried to tell her the …More

name: thatanime chick
text: My moms pizza tasted and smelt like yeast, they offered to make another pizza that she agreed and they did, when she got her second pizza it tasted and smelt the same! Our pizza's had a lot of crust and not a lot of pizza, it also smelt …More

name: Margaret Anderson
text: Great prices for the quality and quantity compared to other pizza joints.

name: Mich ael
text: It's was OK. I've had better

name: Nelson Haynes
text: I felt like I was in a bad comedy. The restaurant smelled bad. The tables were sticky with grease. Very slow inaccurate service. The cook was screaming and crying. The waitress acted as she had been drinking . I do t know why we stayed, I won't go back.

name: JC Yoi
text: Pizzahut is one of my favorite place in the world. In NY it's the busiest place and best place to take your family. I had high expectations. But when I pulled up this place was dead. Tables where dirty. Dark and gloomy. And the salad bar was empty and disgusting. I really hope this place gets a make over cuz they need it BAD

name: Jackie Phillips
text: waitress very good but food took forever. Pizza was ok, not great

name: Deborah S Callihan
text: Nice environment, good service, lighting is to low to read Manu.

name: Kyana Thomas
text: Love this place and always a great attitude from everyone!

name: Christopher Rickard
text: The lunch buffet was good. The bad part is they only have one waitress on shift at a time

name: michigan fans
text: Food was horrible. The phone rang the whole time we were eating. save your money and go to Little Caesars

name: Taffada Russell
text: Great pizza and great service vary nice friendly fast service and taste great

name: G Schinzel
text: Great place for lunch. Great prices.

name: Emily Naylor
text: Order is always right and staff is helpful.

name: Nica O'Brien
text: Great food. Friendly staff.

name: AndreW PoweLL
text: Didn't get food and when we did it was terrible and understaffed.

name: cindy swisher
text: Awesome employees!! Especially the management: Cindy, Kenna & Hannah

name: Bruce King
text: Consistently lousy service. We were the only people in the place for an hour yet tables were not cleaned & they ran out of silverware, diet soda & forgot to make half of our order.

name: Brent Breault
text: Great pizza, the specialty pizzas are even better

name: Dave Finster
text: Water on floor by the buffet. 2 partial pizzas on the buffet. Soggy lettuce. I have been coming to this hut for over 20 years. It's time to close it.

name: Michael Guinn
text: Haven't been there in a few years, probably won't go back, there is much better pizza restaurants in the area, such as Sorrento's in Pontiac for one....

name: Big Lion
text: Pizza sucks!

name: Barbara Zahn
text: Its ok

name: Muhammad Farooq
text: I would give them zero stars "but that's not nice" so instead I give you 1.

name: Zander Breault
text: Lit

name: L Hannah

name: Sandra Fergueson

name: Steven McFly
text: It's pizza hut, nuff said  :-)

name: Patrick Lynn
text: Fast in & out service

name: Jay Preston
text: Service can be a little slow.

name: Sandy Jansen
text: Best pizza around

name: Todd Gehrke
text: Half or quarter star wasn't available, so one will do. They should sell tacos, then close before they sell tacos.

name: rockstarpl0x
text: No salad bar at lunch. But reduced prices for the pizza buffet.

name: Tristan Jackson
text: 2 hours to get pizza with an expected time of 45 minutes. Tipped a dollar guy got mad.

name: Bob Robertson
text: 45 min wait totally under staff

name: Linda Newland
text: Pizza is good, service not

name: Vi Fr
text: Friendly!

name: Tyler Taggart
text: What you expect of pizza Hut but wouldn't take my order 20+ minutes before closing.

name: Garrett Suzak Digital Marketing
text: Their pizza bar makes this place worth coming back to in itself.

name: Ralfy BigBoy
text: The Best!!!

name: Joshua Berven
text: Won't deliver on Dixie, 8 minutes away. Really?

name: Jeffrey Williams
text: waited about a hour on delivery, rude delivery man, couldn't even call me Sir. pizza half cooked, jets is better.
